motto: A fast, light and safe text comunicator, which doesn't try to pretend Messenger, or any kind of stupid platform. Its code is open-source, and not bloat.
landing6: Stickers, GIFs, gifts, you name it. That is a lot of useless features - here at Prudenit we take a different approach.
landing7: We focus on quality, not quantity. That's why our software is better than others!
wrongUsernameLength:
Username is too short, or too long!
It should have a minimum of 2 characters and a maximum of 48 characters!
tooShortPassword: Password is too short! It should have at least 8 characters!
withoutNumberPassword: Your password should have at least one number!
commonlyUsedPassword: Your password is too commonly used!
alreadyAssignedEmail: This email adress is already assigned to another account!
wrongEmailOrPassword: An invalid email or password was provided!
